template.name: demo_import_api
template.value:
from tools import request_tool from tools import assert_tool from tools import random_tool from tools import mysql_tool from tools import excel_tool from tools import log_tool from tools import os_tool from tools import shell_tool import pytest import allure import json from config import conf
$body$

template.name: demo_tools
demo_tools_shell
template.value: def test_shell(): # cmd的echo相当于python的print，打印hello。注意别写中文 cmd = 'echo hello' result = shell_tool.invoke(cmd) print(result)

template.name: demo_tools_log
demo_tools_excel
template.value: def test_excel(): data = excel_tool.get_test_case('data/注册接口sign_up.xlsx') # 第一列测试用例名 print(data[0]) # 测试用例数据集[] print(data[1]) # 第1条测试数据 print(data[1][0]) # 第2条测试数据 print(data[1][1]) # 第3条测试数据 print(data[1][2])

template.name: demo_tools_random
template.value: def test_random(): # 随机电话 tell = random_tool.random_tell() # 随机密码 pwd = random_tool.random_pwd() # 随机数字：0-1 number1 = random_tool.random_number() # 随机数字：3-5 number2 = random_tool.random_number(3, 5) # 随机数字：0-10中的（0,3，6,9） number3 = random_tool.random_number(0, 10, 3) # 随机姓名（不分性别） name = random_tool.random_name() # 随机姓名：男 boy = random_tool.random_name(0) # 随机姓名：女 girl = random_tool.random_name(1) # 随机用户名（拼音） name1 = random_tool.random_name_pinyin() # 生成指定用户名：果芽 name2 = random_tool.random_name_pinyin('果芽') # 随机地址：上海市 addr = random_tool.random_addr() # 随机邮箱 email = random_tool.random_email() # 随机性别：0（男），1（女） sex = random_tool.random_sex()

template.name: demo_tools_mysql
template.value: def test_mysql(): # 获取db链接信息，json格式 db = conf.GY_DB_URL # 写SQL sql = 'SELECT * FROM t_user_user ' row = mysql_tool.query_one(sql,db) print(row) user_name = row['user_name'] pwd = row['pwd']

template.value: # 数据库调用地址 DB_URL = { 'host': 'qa.guoyasoft.com', 'port': 3306, 'db': 'guoya_virtual_mall_1811', 'user': 'root', 'passwd': 'Guoya006', 'charset': 'utf8' }

template.name: demo_conf_api
template.value: GY_API_URL = 'http://dev.guoyasoft.com:8080'

template.name: help
template.value:
################################## # 帮助：help # 写代码：demo ##################################
#############搭API自动化框架###### # 初始化api测试环境：demo_init_api_env # 初始化api测试工程：demo_init_api_project ##################################
################################## # demo_init:搭框架 # demo_conf:配置模板 # demo_import:导入模板 # demo_http：http请求演示 # demo_data:请求数据处理演示 # demo_tools:工具用法演示 # demo_api:接口调用实例 ##################################
################################## # demo_conf_api：接口url地址模板 # demo_conf_db:数据库配置模板 ##################################
################################## # demo_import_api：接口测试导入模板 ##################################
################################## # demo_tools:工具包全部使用模板 # demo_tools_excel:excel工具使用模板 # demo_tools_mysql:mysql工具使用模板 # demo_tools_random:random工具使用模板 # demo_tools_log:log工具使用模板 # demo_tools_shell:shell工具使用模板 ##################################
################################## # demo_api_login：登陆接口模板（4种模板） # demo_api_login：登陆接口模板-常量 # demo_api_login_var：登陆接口模板-变量 # demo_api_login_param：登陆接口模板-参数化（数据分离） # demo_api_login_zuhe：登陆接口模板-组合使用（常量+变量+参数化） ##################################

template.name: demo_conf_token
template.value:
@pytest.fixture(scope='session') def driver_data(): driver_data = {} sign_data = sign_up() login_data = login(sign_data) driver_data=dict(sign_data.items()+login_data.items()) return driver_data
def login(sign_data): # config/conf.py里面配置GY_API_URL,模板快捷键demo_conf_api url = conf.GY_API_URL+'/login' req = { "pwd": sign_data['pwd'], "userName": sign_data['user_name'] } resp = request_tool.post_request(url,json=req) body = resp.json() # 判断响应码 assert_tool.assert_equal(resp.status_code, 200) # 自定义断言 assert_tool.assert_equal(body['code'],2000) data =body['data'] if data !='': token = data['token'] assert_tool.assert_not_null(token)
login_data = {} login_data['token']=token return login_data
def sign_up(): sign_data = {} # config/conf.py里面配置GY_API_URL,模板快捷键demo_conf_api url = conf.GY_API_URL + '/signup' phone = random_tool.random_tell() pwd = random_tool.random_pwd() pinyin = random_tool.random_name_pinyin() num = str(random_tool.random_number(0,9)) user_name = pinyin+num
req = { "phone": phone, "pwd": pwd, "rePwd": pwd, "userName": user_name } resp = request_tool.post_request(url, json=req) body = resp.json() # 判断响应码 assert_tool.assert_equal(resp.status_code, 200) # 自定义断言 assert_tool.assert_equal(body['code'], 2000) data = body['data'] if data != '': user_id = data['userId'] assert_tool.assert_not_null(user_id)
sign_data['phone']=phone sign_data['pwd']=pwd sign_data['user_name']=user_name return sign_data

template.name: demo_http_get_qury
demo_http_get_path
template.value: def test_cst_get_all(driver_data): page_num = 1 page_size = 3 url = 'http://dev.guoyasoft.com:8080/cst/getAll/%s/%s'%(page_num,page_size) headers = { 'token': driver_data['token'], 'charset': 'UTF-8' } resp = request_tool.get_request(url,headers=headers) body = resp.json() # 判断响应码 assert_tool.assert_equal(resp.status_code, 200) # 自定义断言 assert_tool.assert_equal(body['code'], 2000)

template.name: demo_http_get_path_qury
template.value: def test_get_SKU(driver_data): page_num = 1 page_size = 3 url = 'http://dev.guoyasoft.com:8080/product/getSKU/%s/%s'%(page_num, page_size) req = { 'status': 0, 'startTime': '2018-10-18 09:41:18', 'endTime': '2019-10-19 10:41:18' } headers = { 'token': driver_data['token'], 'charset': 'UTF-8' } resp = request_tool.get_request(url, params=req, headers=headers) body = resp.json() # 判断响应码 assert_tool.assert_equal(resp.status_code, 200) # 自定义断言 assert_tool.assert_equal(body['code'], 2000)

template.name: demo_http_post_qury
template.value: def test_full_sku(driver_data): # config/conf.py里面配置GY_API_URL,模板快捷键demo_conf_api url = 'http://dev.guoyasoft.com:8080/product/fullSku' req = { "skuCode": "4l300_红色_max500", "qty": 10 } headers = { 'token': driver_data['token'], 'charset': 'UTF-8' } resp = request_tool.post_request(url, params=req,headers=headers) body = resp.json() # 判断响应码 assert_tool.assert_equal(resp.status_code, 200) # 自定义断言 assert_tool.assert_equal(body['code'], 2000)

template.name: demo_http_post_form
template.value: def test_lock(driver_data): # config/conf.py里面配置GY_API_URL,模板快捷键demo_conf_api url = 'http://dev.guoyasoft.com:8080/user/lock' req = {'userName': driver_data['user_name']} headers = { 'token': driver_data['token'], 'charset': 'UTF-8', 'Content-Type': 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded' } resp = request_tool.post_request(url, data=req, headers=headers) body = resp.json() # 判断响应码 assert_tool.assert_equal(resp.status_code, 200) # 自定义断言 assert_tool.assert_equal(body['code'], 2000)

template.name: demo_http_post_json
template.value: def test_change_pwd_var(driver_data): # config/conf.py里面配置GY_API_URL,模板快捷键demo_conf_api url = conf.GY_API_URL + '/user/changepwd' pwd = random_tool.random_pwd() req = { "newPwd": pwd, "oldPwd": driver_data['pwd'], "reNewPwd": pwd, "userName": driver_data['user_name'] } headers = { 'token': driver_data['token'], 'charset': 'UTF-8' } resp = request_tool.post_request(url, json=req, headers=headers) body = resp.json() # 判断响应码 assert_tool.assert_equal(resp.status_code, 200) # 自定义断言 assert_tool.assert_equal(body['code'], 2000)

template.name: demo_http_get_download_file
template.value:
def test_download_file(driver_data): # config/conf.py里面配置GY_API_URL,模板快捷键demo_conf_api url = 'http://dev.guoyasoft.com:8080/product/downProdRepertory' prid_code = '4l300' req = {'pridCode': prid_code} headers = { 'token':driver_data['token'], 'charset':'UTF-8' } resp = request_tool.get_request(url,params=req,headers=headers) # 判断响应码 assert_tool.assert_equal(resp.status_code, 200) # 自定义断言 file = resp.content
root_path = os_tool.get_root_path()+'download' os_tool.mkdir(root_path) file_path = '%s/pro_repository_%s.xls'%(root_path,prid_code) log_tool.debug(file_path) # 1. 写二进制文件：wb # 2. 读写二进制，不需要带encoding参数 with open(file_path,'wb') as f: f.write(file)

template.name: demo_http_token
demo_http_post_upload_file
template.value: def test_post_upload_file(driver_data): # config/conf.py里面配置GY_API_URL,模板快捷键demo_conf_api url = 'http://dev.guoyasoft.com:8080/product/uploaProdRepertory' root_path = os_tool.get_root_path() file_path = root_path+'download/pro_repository_4l300.xls' file = {'file': open(file_path,'rb')} headers = { 'token': driver_data['token'], 'charset': 'UTF-8' } resp = request_tool.post_request(url, files=file, headers=headers) body = resp.json() # 判断响应码 assert_tool.assert_equal(resp.status_code, 200) # 自定义断言 assert_tool.assert_equal(body['code'], 2000)

template.name: demo_http_https
template.value: def test_sign_up(): url = 'https://www.dev.guoyasoft.com/signup' req = { "phone": "18716253252", "pwd": "aaa123", "rePwd": "aaa123", "userName": "wuling98" } resp = request_tool.post_request(url, json=req) body = resp.json() print(body) # 判断响应码 assert_tool.assert_equal(resp.status_code, 200) # 自定义断言 assert_tool.assert_equal(body['code'], 2000) data = body['data'] if data != '': user_id = data['userId'] assert_tool.assert_not_null(user_id)

template.name: demo_data_constants
template.value: def test_sign_up(): url = 'http://dev.guoyasoft.com:8080/signup' req = { "phone": "18716253215", "pwd": "aaa123", "rePwd": "aaa123", "userName": "wuling90" } resp = request_tool.post_request(url, json=req) body = resp.json() # 判断响应码 assert_tool.assert_equal(resp.status_code, 200) # 自定义断言 assert_tool.assert_equal(body['code'], 2000) data = body['data'] if data != '': user_id = data['userId'] assert_tool.assert_not_null(user_id)

template.name: demo_data_varibles
template.value: def test_sign_up_var(): # config/conf.py里面配置GY_API_URL,模板快捷键demo_conf_api url = conf.GY_API_URL + '/signup' phone = random_tool.random_tell() pwd = random_tool.random_pwd() pinyin = random_tool.random_name_pinyin() num = str(random_tool.random_number(0,9)) user_name = pinyin+num req = { "phone": phone, "pwd": pwd, "rePwd": pwd, "userName": user_name } resp = request_tool.post_request(url, json=req) body = resp.json() # 判断响应码 assert_tool.assert_equal(resp.status_code, 200) # 自定义断言 assert_tool.assert_equal(body['code'], 2000) data = body['data'] if data != '': user_id = data['userId'] assert_tool.assert_not_null(user_id)
template.description: 接口请求数据，随机变量

template.name: demo_data_db
template.value: def test_login_var(): # config/conf.py里面配置GY_API_URL,模板快捷键demo_conf_api url = conf.GY_API_URL+'/login' sql = 'select * from t_user_user limit 1' # 先再config/conf.py里面配置DB_URL，模板快捷键demo_conf_db db = conf.DB_URL user = mysql_tool.query_one(sql,db) req = { "pwd": user['pwd'], "userName": user['user_name'] } resp = request_tool.post_request(url,json=req) body = resp.json() # 判断响应码 assert_tool.assert_equal(resp.status_code, 200) # 自定义断言 assert_tool.assert_equal(body['code'],2000) data =body['data'] if data !='': token = data['token'] assert_tool.assert_not_null(token)

template.name: demo_data_paramters
template.value:
########### 注册接口sign_up.xlsx ################ # case_name i_user_name i_pwd i_repwd i_phone o_code o_userId # 注册成功 wuling1323 aaaa123 aaaa123 18699872345 2000 not null # 用户名已存在 wuling1323 aaaa123 aaaa123 18699872346 9999 # 手机号已存在 wuling1324 aaaa123 aaaa123 18699872345 9999 ############################################# data = excel_tool.get_test_case('data/注册接口sign_up.xlsx')
@pytest.mark.parametrize('i_user_name,i_pwd,i_repwd,i_phone,o_code,o_userId', data[1], ids=data[0]) def test_sign_up_param(i_user_name, i_pwd, i_repwd, i_phone, o_code, o_userId): # config/conf.py里面配置GY_API_URL = 'http://dev.guoyasoft.com:8080' url = conf.GY_API_URL + '/signup' req = { "phone": i_phone, "pwd": i_pwd, "rePwd": i_repwd, "userName": i_user_name } resp = request_tool.post_request(url, json=req) body = resp.json() # 判断响应码 assert_tool.assert_equal(resp.status_code, 200) # 自定义断言 assert_tool.assert_equal(body['code'], o_code) data = body['data'] if o_userId == 'not null' and data != '': user_id = data['userId'] assert_tool.assert_not_null(user_id)
template.description: 接口请求数据，外部数据

template.name: demo_data_together
template.description: 接口请求数据，组合：常量+随机+DB+外部数据

template.name: demo_init_api_project
template.value:
from tools import init_tool
init_tool.init_api_project()

template.name: demo_init_api_env
template.value: import subprocess ############################## # 初始化环境：第三方依赖包+果芽工具包 ############################## cmd = 'pip install --upgrade guoya-api-test' subprocess.call(cmd,shell=True)
